creator: kk@kohsuke.org
text:
Today, one can start/stop/restart web applications by using the manager.
(See
http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-5.5-doc/manager-howto.html#Reload%20An%20Existing%20Application)

It would be really nice if one can do this from the admin console, too.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text: I'm not a fan of duplicating functionality.

creator: kk@kohsuke.org
text:
Duplicating what? the manager?

I guess all I was asking was to have links from admin GUI to the appropriate
manager perhaps, so that I don't have to manually type in the manager URL nor do
I need to remember that such functionality actually exists in the manager
altogether.

I mean, that's easier to use, isn't it? And where is the duplication of
functionality?
